description:
Its a Challenge, are you ready to take it? Want to impress your 'FRIENDS' ?

Today Spend Quality Time With Your 'KIDS' by learning to solve the Rubik's Cube with them.

Gift this course to your Dear Ones.

Benefits of Solving the Cube are -

  • Confidence building.
  • Sequential problem solving ability building.
  • Enhancing Spatial Reasoning.
  • Patience building.
  • and its a fun.

You need a 3 X 3 X 3 Rubik's Cube and Some Patience.

A step by step video, audio tutorial will be guiding you to solve the cube. With some practice you will able to solve it in 2 - 3 minutes. This course is specifically for the beginners, but people who already know how to solve are requested to view the promo video so that the can decide whether to go for the course.

The Rubik's cube was invented by Hungarian architect Erno Rubik in 1974. The Rubik's cube was originally called the Magic Cube.

Depending on the grasping power you will able to solve this cube in One to three days, but to solve it in 2-3 minutes you will require some practise.

This course is for All Fun Loving People. Be the Star, impress friends, colleague by solving the cube.

All the Best.
title: Solving the Rubik's Cube Made Easy
